nodes.text: The Droid Depot toy line is a series of toys sold at the Droid Depot shops found in the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge area at Disneyland and Disney's Hollywood Studios starting in 2019. The line includes various models of customizable droid toys made in the shop, as well as other toys and merchandise. A number of products in the line were previewed at Star Wars Celebration Chicago in April 2019.
